se.aqba.framework.elpollo

Interface ElPollo.Packages.Listener

  • Enclosing class:
    ElPollo.Packages

    public static interface ElPollo.Packages.Listener
    A package load listener.
    See Also:
    ElPollo.Packages.addListener(Listener, String...)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onLoad(java.lang.String pkg, java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
      Called when a package is loaded.
      Any overrides you want to add to the package must be done from this callback.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoad

        void onLoad(java.lang.String pkg,
          java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader)
        Called when a package is loaded.
        Any overrides you want to add to the package must be done from this callback.
        Parameters:
        pkg - The name of the package. Can be one of ElPollo.Packages.SYSTEM, ElPollo.Packages.SERVER or an installed package.
        classLoader - The class loader used for loading the package.
        See Also:
        ElPollo.Overrides
